translation.en: You know, there's nothing like the experience of raising your first dog.
translation.zh: 第一次养狗经验是很难忘的

translation.en: The simple joy of walking side by side with your buddy...
...out in the fresh air, throwing a stick.
translation.zh: 享受新鲜空气 玩树枝

translation.en: Spending some quiet time, just you and your very best friend.
translation.zh: 只与这哥儿们一起 享受宁静

translation.en: Of course, that wasn't my experience.
translation.zh: 显然 那并不是我的经验

translation.en: That kid's not even me.
That's me.
And that crazy hound I'm chasing is Marley, the world's worst dog.
translation.zh: 那疯狗叫马利 世界最烦的狗

translation.en: Sorry.
Or so I thought.
But our story begins before Marley was born...
translation.zh: 故事要从它出生前说起

translation.en: ...four years before, on my wedding day...
...which happened to be the day of the worst freak spring blizzard...
translation.zh: 不仅下了有史以来最大的风雪

translation.en: ...in the history of southern Michigan, the same day our car broke down.
translation.zh: 不仅下了有史以来最大的风雪 我们的礼车还抛锚

translation.en: But we didn't care.
Oh, God, that feels so good.
So, what do you think that means, a blizzard on your wedding day?
translation.zh: 结婚遇着暴风雪 代表什么？

translation.en: Is that good luck? Is that bad luck?
I think it's good luck.
-How did I get you? -What?
Honestly, how did I--? How did I get that lucky?
translation.zh: 真的 我怎么会这么幸运？

translation.en: Well, you know...
...I get asked that question all the time.
Come on. Are you kidding, honey?
You're part of the plan.
-The plan? -My plan.
Step one, meet an incredibly sweet, smart, sexy man.
translation.zh:
第一步
遇上一个迷人 聪明 性感的男人

translation.en: Done. Step two?
Marry you instead.
Then step three--
-I don't think I can take any more. -You don't want to hear step three?
-What's step three? -It's easy.
-Be gentle. -Move someplace warmer.
I knew you were gonna say that.
-Okay. -Thank you.
-All right, you know you got this, right? -Oh, yeah. I got it.
-Who are you? -I'm John Grogan?
No, you're John frigging Grogan, who's about to get a job as a reporter...
translation.zh: 你是“约翰一定行” 这份大报一定请你做记者

translation.en: ...for a major metropolitan newspaper.
translation.zh: 这份大报一定请你做记者

translation.en: -I don't feel like getting out of the car. -Well, you have to.
-Why don't we drive around the block? -No, baby. Come on, get out of the car.
translation.zh:
-不如去兜风？
-不行 赶快下车

translation.en: Get out.
-Now, who am I again? -Oh, please.
-Sebastian says you won some award? -Mitchy. Yeah, I have a Mitchy.
translation.zh:
-史柏汀说你得过奖
-密西根新闻奖

translation.en: It's like a Pulitzer, but from western Michigan.
translation.zh: 像普立兹奖 但是州际的

translation.en: A Mitchy.
So tell me, what made you leave the estimable Kalamazoo Gazette?
translation.zh: 告诉我 为什么离开旧报社？

translation.en: Well, as you know, Sebastian and I were in college together, and he--
translation.zh: 史柏汀是我的大学同学 而他…

translation.en: He was always saying how great South Florida is...
...and that maybe my wife and I might enjoy it here...
translation.zh: 我与太太会喜欢南佛州

translation.en: ...so we decided to come down here.
-Are you a comedian too? -Excuse me?
Like your friend over here?
-No. -He's walking a very thin line.
It's a good thing he knows how to write.
So your wife is Jenny Havens?
Yes. Jenny Grogan, because we're married. She took my name.
translation.zh: 对 珍妮葛罗根 婚后用了夫姓

translation.en: -She get the job at the Post? -Yes, she did.
-Why didn't they want you over there? -Well, I didn't apply.
Jenny's more of a feature writer, and I'm more of a straight news writer.
translation.zh: 她擅写专题 我擅于报导新闻

translation.en: I thought this would be a better fit for that.
Think you're better than the journalism-school graduates... ...that came here looking for work this morning?
translation.zh:
你认为自己比早上那六个
来应征的新鲜人好？

translation.en: I don't know if I'm better. I--
What I do know is that I have a tendency to surprise myself.
Ten years ago I was doing bong hits and playing "Donkey Kong."
translation.zh: 我十年前只会吸大麻 打电动

translation.en: I never dreamed I'd get into college, but I did, and I graduated with honors.
translation.zh:
没想过会上大学
更没想过会以高分毕业

translation.en: And I never thought I'd get a job at a real newspaper, but I did.
translation.zh: 没想过能在报社工作 最终也成功了

translation.en: And I certainly never thought I'd get a girl like Jenny Havens to marry me...
...but I did.
So?
They already got a guy on the Metro desk.
-Yeah. -I'm sorry, honey.
So they're putting me on a little thing they like to call "Desert Storm."
translation.zh: 所以派我写海湾战争等等的杂事

translation.en: -You got the job? -Got the job.
You got the job, baby.
Oh, John Grogan, I knew it. I just knew it.
translation.zh: 早知道你一定行 我就知道！

translation.en: Okay, look. Watch this. Look.
See what happens? Job: done.
-So, what's next? Lunch? -House.
-House. -House.
--that can transmit remote television pictures... ...of Iraqi ships and other targets.
translation.zh:
可传送伊军船只
及其它目标等影像…

translation.en: Did you get to the quote about the speed bumps yet?
-"If they save even one life--" -"It would be worth it.
And with that, Janet Dickerson's eyes filled with tears."
translation.zh: 说毕 珍纳眼框布满泪水”

translation.en: Filled with tears.
-Do you like that or is it too corny? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-你喜欢吗？ 不会太肉麻了吗？
-不会

translation.en: -No. -Is it a little over-the-top?
Hey, honey, what happened to the Desert Storm piece?
That's it. The injured girl's dad's in Kuwait. Is that not in there?
translation.zh:
有关
她的父亲在科威特内容没提及？

translation.en: I think they cut that.
They even-- They spelled your name wrong.
-"John Gorgan." -You're kidding.
-Let me see that. Are you joking? -Forget it.
You know what? It's good. It's really good. It's got the facts, it's got color.
translation.zh:
你写得很好 写实又生动
是篇出色报导

translation.en: -It's a really solid piece. -Thanks.
I tried to breathe some life into it, you know?
Yes.
I like this article. I'm almost done with yours.
translation.zh: 我喜欢你写的这篇文章

translation.en: This idea of voting machines sounds really efficient.
translation.zh: 用投票机应该很有效率

translation.en: When you get to the next page...
...you'll see that I talk about what could happen.
translation.zh: 便知道我想带出什么问题

translation.en: -Oh, okay, I see, it continues. -Yeah.
But actually, the rest of it is really just okay.
-It's actually kind of boring. -No, no, it's-- I'm enjoying this.
They really gave you a lot of space.
translation.zh: 哇 他们给你很多版面

translation.en: Oh, damn. Killed another one.
translation.zh: 气死人 又死了一盆

translation.en: How am I ever supposed to take care of a kid if I can't even keep a plant alive?
translation.zh: 盆栽也种不好 怎生儿育女

translation.en: Well, what did you expect, man? You bought a house.
-A house with a spare room. -What's the matter with a spare room?
It's empty, John, that's what's wrong with it.
And you know what else is empty?
-Her womb. -Her womb.
-I'm worried Jenny's at like step seven. -What?
translation.zh:
-我怕她已经走到第七步
-什么？

translation.en: She's got her whole life organized and planned out according to these steps.
translation.zh: 她规划好一生 逐步进行

translation.en: Okay, that's scary. Unbelievable.
You want my advice?
Get her, like, a bird or a puppy or something.
translation.zh: 送她小鸟还是小狗之类的宠物

translation.en: What, like a parakeet?
Something other than you that she has to take care of.
translation.zh: 总之需要她分心照顾的东西

translation.en: You got a kid, you're a dad. You're not you anymore.
translation.zh: 一旦为人父 就很难做回自己了

translation.en: -You got a dog, you're a master. -Master.
translation.zh:
-养只狗 你就是主人
-主人

translation.en: -You're still a guy. -Still got a life.
-Exactly. -And a dog.
Yeah, but you've stopped her clock for a few years.
translation.zh: 可以拖延她的生子大计

translation.en: -I never had a dog. -Nothing to it.
Feed them, walk them, let them out now and again.
translation.zh: 带它散步小便 喂狗粮

translation.en: But it doesn't really matter. You're not gonna take care of it, Jenny is.
translation.zh: 照顾它的是珍妮 与你无关

translation.en: -Sebastian! -Yo.
Your travel's been approved. Hit the road.
translation.zh: 批准你出差了 起程！

translation.en: -Where are you going? -I'm going to Colombia.
I got a guy down there that says he can put me next to Pablo Escobar.
translation.zh: 有人说可以帮我接近大毒枭

translation.en: I'm doing a piece.
I follow a single coca leaf from the jungle to the streets of Miami.
translation.zh: 我打算写《直击迈阿密毒品王国》

translation.en: Sounds like a good idea. You gotta be careful down there--
translation.zh: 好题材 但你要小心…

translation.en: Gorgan!
-Grogan. -Grodin. A fire at the county dump.
translation.zh:
-是葛罗根
-歌登 垃圾场火灾！

translation.en: -Methane leak. -Methane?
Yeah, I want two paragraphs for the blotter.
Methane.
Woodward and Bernstein, eat your heart out.
translation.zh: 古今名记者一定羡慕我

translation.en: What kind of dog?
-You remember Caroline? -The nurse?
She was a nursery-school teacher, I don't know.
Anyway, she had this great dog, Daisy.
translation.zh: 她养了只好狗 叫戴丝

translation.en: -It was a Labradoodle. -"Labradoodle"?
-Maybe a Labrador. -All right, get her a Labrador.
translation.zh:
-我会养拉布拉多
-也行啊 就养拉布拉多

translation.en: Supposed to be just like kids, only easier to train.
translation.zh: 送给她 狗就像小孩 但更易训练

translation.en: "Labradoodle"? Come on.
translation.zh: 与贵宾狗混种？别开玩笑了

translation.en: -This does not smell like an IHOP. -We got a little surprise first.
translation.zh:
-这里的气味不像餐厅
-先送你小惊喜

translation.en: Here we go.
Now, I want you to walk right here, my dear.
Okay.
-Come on. -Oh, God.
-Okay. -Are you Grogan?
-Yes. -Expected you an hour ago.
translation.zh:
-是
-一个小时前就开始等你了

translation.en: You're gonna like this. Step up. It's all right. Okay?
translation.zh: 你会喜欢的 踏上去

translation.en: -Sorry about the mess. -Okay.
translation.zh:
-对不起 这里又乱
-没关系

translation.en: -And the noise. And the smell. -What's happening?
Come on.
-Can I look? -No, no. Almost, almost.
-Okay. Okay, ready? -Really?
One, two, three, go.
-Happy birthday. -What?
-God, they're adorable. -Get in.
Oh, my-- My birthday's not for a month.
translation.zh: 我的生日还有一个月才到

translation.en: Oh, that's okay, they can't leave for three weeks anyway.
translation.zh: 不要紧 三星期后才可以带走

translation.en: -John, we didn't discuss this. -I know, but it was a surprise. You can't.
translation.zh:
-我们没商量过！
-我知道 但这是惊喜

translation.en: -Hi, guys. -Just rescued the mom last month.
translation.zh:
-你们好
-我上月收养了狗妈妈

translation.en: Family that gave her up didn't even know she was pregnant.
translation.zh: 那家人根本不知它已怀孕

translation.en: -You sure we're ready for this? -Well, like I told you...
...you gotta wait three weeks before you can bring them home.
translation.zh: 要多等三星期让它们断奶

translation.en: -I'm not even gonna be here. -Why?
translation.zh:
-到时我也不会在这里啊
-为什么？

translation.en: -I'll be in Gainesville, covering that trial. -That's okay.
translation.zh:
-三星期后我要出城采访一个审判
-没关系

translation.en: It'll give me a chance to bond with him and get a head start on training him.
translation.zh:
我可先跟它培养感情
这样你回家前…

translation.en: Get him squared away before you get home.
-That's true. -Yeah.
-Well, how are we gonna pick one? -Girls are 300, boys are 275.
translation.zh:
-选哪只才好？
-母的三百元 公的两百七十五元

translation.en: Except for that little guy there. Him you could have for 200 even.
translation.zh: 这只除外 它只要两百元

translation.en: This one? You're so sweet. You're like a little clearance puppy.
translation.zh: 这只？你好可爱 你是特价小狗呢！

translation.en: -Hello, puppy. -This one likes you.
Clearance Puppy likes you.
-Well, that's your guy. -I was gonna pick you anyway.
Don't tell anybody. Don't tell the others.
-Honey, be careful. -We gotta double-time it a little bit here.
translation.zh:
-天啊！小心点！
-最好快点 快起飞了

translation.en: -I really wish I didn't have to go. -It's gonna be great.
You spent eight months on this trial. I'm jealous.
translation.zh:
你花了八个月的时间
我多妒忌你能报导这案子啊

translation.en: Really? Tax evasion? That's what makes you jealous?
translation.zh: 真的吗？逃税案也值得妒忌？

translation.en: Well, it's sexier than speed bumps.
-Call me the minute you get him home. -Okay. Okay.
-We also have to come up with a name. -Yes, well, let's brainstorm it.
I'll just call him Clearance Puppy till you get back.
Are you gonna be okay?
-Worried about me with a puppy? -I am.
translation.zh:
-你担心我搞不定一只小狗？
-是啊

translation.en: -Me, John frigging Grogan? Come on. -I know.
translation.zh:
-“约翰一定行”照顾不了一只小狗
-我知道啦

translation.en: -Goodbye. I love you. You look pretty. -Thank you. I love you. Bye.
translation.zh:
-再见 我爱你 你很美
-我爱你 再见！

translation.en: How you doing there, buddy?
Kind of a big day for you.
Let's listen to the radio. Awkward silences.
translation.zh: 相对无言 听收音机好了

translation.en: You like that? You like Bob Marley?
Bob. Would that be a good name? Bob.
Bob. Come here, Bob.
Or Robert when you got older? More dignified?
translation.zh: 或罗勃？你长大后可以用 比较稳重

translation.en: Marley? You like that.
That has a nice ring to it.
Okay, whoa, come on.
It's better if you ride shotgun...
...because we don't wanna have a car crash on our first real day together.
translation.zh: 才第一天相处 不想撞车收场

translation.en: Okay, come here. Come here.
It's a big day. You can ride over here.
translation.zh: 今天是大日子 随你坐

translation.en: Maybe it's okay today, just this one time.
translation.zh: 只此一次 下不为例

translation.en: If we get pulled over, we explain. We explain what the circumstances are.
translation.zh:
如果被警察拦下来
就得跟他瞎掰一阵子了

translation.en: -What happened? -The Millers got robbed.
Again? Good thing I got a watchdog.
translation.zh: 又一件？幸好我有看门狗

translation.en: Hey, buddy.
-He's got some teeth. -Oh, yeah.
I'll just get him some water.
You're not gonna keep him in the backyard.
Gonna keep him in the garage till I get him housetrained.
translation.zh: 它还不懂规矩 暂时养在车库

translation.en: Marley, no, no. Marley, Marley, Marley. Oh, no.
translation.zh:
马利！不
不要 马利！

translation.en: Hey, you've had enough food, Marley. You've had two bowls of kibble.
translation.zh: 你吃够了 你已经吃掉两碗

translation.en: You had half a seat belt in the car.
How are you still eating?
I don't understand where you can put it.
And here's the little box where Marley is going to bunk down.
Pretty cozy. All right, good night.
translation.zh: 挺舒适的 好了 晚安

translation.en: You're gonna be okay. I'm just right inside.
translation.zh: 没事的 我就在屋子里

translation.en: Sleep tight.
All right.
Come on, Marley. You're killing me, you know that?
translation.zh: 来吧 我快被你整死了

translation.en: Oh, we've got some cleaning up to do before the missus gets back.
translation.zh: 趁女主人没回来 要先收拾好

translation.en: All right.
I'm off to the airport, and you're gonna ride out the rain right in your little box.
translation.zh: 我要去机场 你在箱内避雨

translation.en: Just a little thunder.
Back in a flash.
-Hi. -Get in here.
Oh, my God.
-Hi. -How are you?
-How's my puppy? -I'm okay.
A little tired, but I'm trying to stay dry.
translation.zh: 有点累 并尽力避雨

translation.en: -Really, how is he? -He's waiting for you.
Do you hear that? Is that--? I think that's Marley.
Oh, my God. Oh, my God. Look at this.
-This is not how I left it. -How long did you leave him here?
translation.zh:
-走时不是这样
-你留下它多久？

translation.en: I left him for maybe an hour, tops. Did he eat the dry wall?
translation.zh: 最多一小时 不会连墙也吃了吧？

translation.en: -Oh, that's not right. -That's-- One little dog did that.
Oh, honey, you're shaking.
Does thunder scare you, mister?
Sweet boy.
Oh, look at us.
So I'm in this cave, and I can feel the machine guns. There's like nine of them around me.
translation.zh:
我身在洞穴中
感觉到有九支机关枪指着我

translation.en: -What, like AK-47s? -Kalashnikovs.
-And then Escobar comes in and says-- -Escobar?
Yeah, he says, "I read your piece on Qaddafi...
translation.zh:
黑帮教父
他说：“我看了你写卡扎菲的文章

translation.en: ...and I think you captured his narcissism perfectly."
translation.zh: 你完全捕捉到他的自恋性格”

translation.en: -Can you believe that? -Some of it.
I wish you could've been there.
But who's gonna cover the power struggle down at the Rotary club in Delray?
translation.zh: 那谁报导扶轮社成员争权等锁碎事

translation.en: Oh, it's been just crazy.
-Your time will come, amigo. -I'll drink to that.
That was crazy. Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 简直就是疯了 天啊

translation.en: -Oh, my God. -That is the cutest thing I've ever seen.
translation.zh:
-天啊
-好可爱呀！没见过这么可爱的狗

translation.en: Say hello, Marley.
-Can I hold him? -Of course. Here you go.
-You're so cute. -Oh, I love their puppy breath.
Oh, have you guys met my buddy Sebastian?
translation.zh: 我来介绍 我朋友史柏汀

translation.en: Sebastian, Viviana. Nice to meet you.
translation.zh:
-史柏汀 我是薇薇安 幸会
-嗨

translation.en: -Hi. -Hi, I'm Shannon.
-Hey, he's a beauty, isn't he? -He's adorable.
I actually think the "puppy instead of a baby" idea is working.
Yeah, it's certainly working for me.
Can I take him home? You're so cute, yes, you are.
I can't let you have the puppy, but you might have a shot with the big dog.
translation.zh: 这小狗不能给你 何不考虑这大狗

translation.en: -Oh, yeah? -I'm easy.
-Oh, you're easy? -And I do tricks. I'm paper-trained.
translation.zh:
-是吗？
-会接飞盘 不随地小便

translation.en: Oh, no, no.
-Oh, my God. -Marley.
-Marley! -Come back, puppy.
Marley! Marley!
Marley!
Marley! Marley!
-Marley! -Marley!
-Got him. Thanks. -You have to be more careful, man.
It's our first week together, so we're still working out the kinks.
translation.zh: 我们只相处了一周 彼此还在适应

translation.en: You shouldn't bring a dog to the dog beach until he's trained.
translation.zh: 没训练之前别带狗来沙滩！

translation.en: Okay, can I get the dog back?
Never let him off leash unless you have complete confidence.
translation.zh:
-若没信心 别解开狗链
-好

translation.en: This is the only beach in two counties where dogs aren't banned.
translation.zh:
-附近只有这沙滩可携狗进入
-好的

translation.en: Cops see anybody peeing or pooping down by the water, they'll shut us down.
translation.zh:
若警察发现有狗在海中便溺
会把这关闭

translation.en: Why is that funny to you?
I'm just very immature.
Calvin!
See? Aren't you glad you're not Calvin? See how easy you got it?
translation.zh: 庆幸自己不是凯文？看你多自由？

translation.en: Marley, stop.
Marley. Marley.
Honey, the dog's got my....
Marley, no.
Marley, you can't go through a screen door.
Hey, Steve.
-Happy Thanksgiving. -You too.
Marley.
It just seems like there's other guys. Don't understand why you thought of me.
translation.zh: 还有其他记者 为什么找我？

translation.en: -I'm in a bind. -Yeah, but I'm a reporter, not a columnist.
translation.zh:
-我没办法
-我是记者 非专栏作家

translation.en: John, you'll get better pay.
You can pick your own hours and choose your own topics.
translation.zh: 自己决定写作时间及题材

translation.en: Why are you hesitating?
-I'm thinking. -No, you're hesitating.
translation.zh:
-没有 我在考虑
-不 你在犹豫

translation.en: I'm offering a promotion and you're hesitating.
translation.zh: 我升你职 你竟然犹豫！

translation.en: I never saw myself as a columnist.
Oh, well, think of it as one of those times when you surprise yourself.
Okay.
It's only a couple of times a week until I get a replacement for Jerry.
translation.zh: 每周数篇而己 一请到人

translation.en: Then you can go back to doing whatever it was you were doing.
-What were you doing? -Obituaries, methane leaks.
-Are you okay with this? -Yes.
You don't seem thrilled.
-No, it's a promotion. -We can take away the raise if you like.
translation.zh:
-怎么会 升职耶！
-想我撤回加薪？

translation.en: No, no, I'm-- Thank you.
All right, now you're talking. Go on, get to work.
translation.zh: 这才像人话 回去工作

translation.en: Marley. I think he dislocated my shoulder.
He doesn't even heel. Doesn't walk, he just sprints.
translation.zh: 它不跟紧也不散步 只会一昧的冲

translation.en: Marley. God. Marley, stop. Down here. Come on.
I had to pull him off three dogs today.
translation.zh: 还骑在其他三条狗身上

translation.en: -Poodles? -Among others.
I say we give him away to a farm.
Isn't that usually what you do with dogs that are out of control?
translation.zh: 不乖的狗都会送给农场吧？

translation.en: Well, usually you train them.
Or you train them. Come on, down. Come on.
translation.zh: 不如由你训练 下去

translation.en: What are you doing?
Arnie gave me a column.
Are you kidding? Baby, that's great.
Oh, yeah, it's a big honor.
I get to write about zoning laws and give my opinion on yard sales.
translation.zh: 我要写分区法和对二手拍卖的意见

translation.en: Whoa, down, boy. Easy with the enthusiasm.
No, it's just I don't even read this crap when other people write it.
translation.zh: 我自己都不会看这些垃圾

translation.en: Now I'm supposed to, you know, write two columns a week?
And you've got nothing for Tuesday.
-No, I got nothing for Tuesday. -I bet you're gonna think of something.
See, this gives me a little inspiration, but it's not for a column. It's more like--
translation.zh: 令我想做其它事 但与专栏无关

translation.en: Look at Marley. Now he's eating the floor.
Marley, stop.
Marley, you're incorrigible.
"Incorrigible." I don't believe in that word. Every dog wants to learn.
translation.zh:
死性不改 我才不信
每只狗都想学好

translation.en: Hey, come here, baby.
Yes, you're a good girl. You're a good girl, yes, you are.
translation.zh: 乖 你真是个乖女生！

translation.en: Of course, they can't learn if their parents are weak-willed.
translation.zh: 若主人不够坚定便难学好

translation.en: Yeah, well, I'm pretty strong-willed, but....
-Marley. Sorry. -Say hello to Marley.
translation.zh:
-马利！不好意思
-跟马利打个招呼

translation.en: So which of you is gonna be the trainer?
We both thought we would. We'd like him to listen to both of us.
translation.zh: 一起 两个都要服从

translation.en: We're married, so yeah.
No, no, no. A dog can only have one master.
translation.zh: 不 狗只能有一主人

translation.en: Which one of you has the most natural authority... ...in your own relationship?
translation.zh: 在你们的关系里谁比较大牌？

translation.en: Well, maybe I'll stand over there for the beginning.
I thought so. Shall we?
-Jeez. -All right. Sit.
-Sit. -Sit.
Sit.
Sit. Marley. Okay, Marley. Marley, sit.
This, class, is a classic example...
translation.zh: 各位 它是典型例子

translation.en: ...of a dog who has foolishly been allowed to believe...
...he is the alpha male of the pack.
And therefore, he can never be a happy animal.
Yeah, he looks pretty miserable.
translation.zh: 对 它看起来还真悲惨呢

translation.en: You, joker.
Rotate in. And lose the sunglasses.
translation.zh: 换你来 拿下太阳眼镜

translation.en: A dog likes to be looked at in the eye.
-I got it. Okay. -Okay.
-You got him? Okay. -Yep.
So collar your dogs.
Good boy.
All right, dogs on the left. On the count of three.
One, two, three. Let's go.
translation.zh: 一 二 三 走！

translation.en: Walk. Walk.
-Very nice. -Heel.
-Go. -Very good.
Good.
-Hey. -Correct him. Rein in that dog.
All right. All right, class. Come on, let's line up again.
translation.zh: 好了 全部过来 再排好

translation.en: Class, it's a simple question of having confidence in your own authority.
translation.zh: 各位 要对自己的权威有信心

translation.en: I shall now demonstrate a simple walk, all right?
-Come here. -Mr. Grogan.
-Sorry. -May I?
All right, even an unruly dog likes to obey his leader.
translation.zh: 即使最无纪律的狗都喜欢服从主人

translation.en: Marley, heel.
There.
Marley. Marley. Marley! Marley!
Marley.
Careful. Marley, no! Marley!
-Are you okay? -That's it. He is out.
-He usually only does this with poodles. -That dog is a bad influence on the others.
translation.zh:
-对不起 它通常只选贵宾狗
-它会教坏其他狗

translation.en: No. Leg humping is like a virus.
translation.zh: 磨脚这行为像病毒一样！

translation.en: Once it takes hold of the group.... No.
translation.zh: 其他狗会有样学样 不！

translation.en: -Okay. -He has got to go.
It was maybe your hair.
It reminded him of a poodle.
-Never bring him back. -Okay.
Right from the beginning, she had me in her sights.
-I know, she really did. -Marley wouldn't take any of her crap.
translation.zh:
-她真的是
-马利不听她那套废话

translation.en: That's why he got kicked out. You are now the world's worst dog.
translation.zh:
所以被赶走
你真是 你真是世界上最烦的狗

translation.en: You've been kicked out of obedience school.
translation.zh: 连服从训练班也赶你走

translation.en: You know, there is something else that we could do.
No, I know, we just-- We get an--
No, no, no.
I'm smiling, but I'm serious. No.
translation.zh: 我在笑 但认真反对

translation.en: It's not gonna be so bad, buddy. You'll see. Sex is overrated.
translation.zh: 被阉其实不太糟 性爱根本不好玩

translation.en: I can't tell you that, because you know it's a lie.
translation.zh: 多讲无谓 你明知我在说谎

translation.en: Poor son of a bitch.
Okay, you wanna come up? Yeah, that's the least I can do.
translation.zh: 想上来吗？我只能帮你完成这心愿

translation.en: -Get a little fresh air. -Marley.
Oh, gosh, it's like he's walking the plank.
That's what breaks my heart. He's so happy.
translation.zh:
看它兴高采烈
仍不知将发生何事

translation.en: -He doesn't know what's coming. -Honey, he's gonna be fine.
translation.zh:
看它兴高采烈
仍不知将发生何事 它会没事的 老公

translation.en: -Oh, no, no, now I'm getting nervous. -He's okay. He's just getting a little air.
translation.zh:
-轮到我紧张了
-它想要新鲜空气

translation.en: It's like Of Mice and Men.
-Whoa, Marley. -John, please, grab him.
-Oh, my God. -He's making a break for it.
-Marley! -He's onto our evil plan.
-Pull over. -I can't stop here. I can't.
-Honey, pull over. -I'm trying to. There's a ton of traffic.
translation.zh:
-停在路边
-我也想 但很多车啊

translation.en: -Come on, pull over. -All right, all right, all right.
Oh, jeez.
-I need a little help here. -I know.
-Hey. Get a leash. -Oh, shut up.
Hey, he's losing his balls today. Cut him some slack.
translation.zh: 它要被阉了 有点同情心嘛！

translation.en: -Got him? Careful, careful. -I got him.
And this is a rough draft because I want-- I'd like to take another pass at it.
translation.zh: 只是草稿 我会重写

translation.en: The beginning, I think I might wanna-- I think we can maybe lose that because I think it gets a little bit jokey.
translation.zh:
我或许会删掉开头
好像太搞笑

translation.en: I just reread it. I didn't think it worked at all.
translation.zh: 我自己重看了一遍 真的很烂

translation.en: -I'm sorry. I'm gonna do the zoning piece. -Wait a minute.
translation.zh:
-这篇太差 对不起 我去重写
-等等！

translation.en: What are you apologizing for? This stuff is hysterical.
-Really? -I'm laughing my head off at this.
Getting kicked out of obedience school, the humping, the great escape. That's really funny stuff. I'm laughing my ass off.
translation.zh:
被赶出服从班 磨脚 大逃亡
很有趣 笑到肚子痛

translation.en: It's hysterical stuff. Run it the way it is.
Thanks.
Listen, you know what makes it work?
translation.zh: 知不知道为何写得出色？

translation.en: What makes it work is that you put yourself into it.
translation.zh: 因为你以自身角度说故事

translation.en: -I like that. -Good.
Look, I know you're a reporter and all... ...but could you do a few more like this?
translation.zh:
我知道你是记者
但是可否多写几篇？

translation.en: -Sure. -Great.
-Okay, great. -And tell your dog not to feel too bad.
Sooner or later, we all lose our balls.
Right. Good to know.
Woke up to a kiss from Marley. Went for a walk that turned into a run.
translation.zh: 被马利吻醒 散步变跑步

translation.en: Took an airboat ride. Wrote about the death of the Everglades.
translation.zh: 坐气艇 以生态为题材

translation.en: Planted an orange tree in the backyard. Threw sticks in the park.
translation.zh: 后园种橘子 玩捡树枝

translation.en: Watched him swim.
Watched him steal some guy's Frisbee. Bought new Frisbee. Gave Marley a bath.
translation.zh: 它偷飞盘 赔飞碟 帮它洗澡

translation.en: Went to work with writer's block. Hoped for inspiration to strike, nada.
translation.zh: 遇上瓶颈 想要灵感 想不到

translation.en: Got a new shirt. Got a new keyboard. Got the same old paycheck.
translation.zh: 新衣服 新键盘 薪水照旧

translation.en: Went windsurfing with Sebastian. Met his new girlfriend.
translation.zh: 去玩风帆 他新女友莎莎

translation.en: Met his other new girlfriend.
Watched models posing in the surf. Wrote about the growth of South Beach.
translation.zh:
看美女骚首弄姿
写有关南滩市的发展

translation.en: Interviewed Gloria and Emilio Estefan at the Cardozo Hotel.
translation.zh: 访问格洛丽亚和埃米利奥埃斯特凡

translation.en: Introduced Jenny, who gushed like a teenager.
translation.zh: 介绍给珍妮 她是歌迷

translation.en: Went shopping. Bought a Sharper Image pillow.
Slept like a baby. Caught Marley eating the pillow. Hid the evidence from Jenny.
translation.zh:
睡得香甜
马利吃掉枕头 帮忙毁灭证据

translation.en: Cleaned up Marley's vomit. Helped Jenny make dinner.
translation.zh: 帮马利清理 跟珍妮煮晚饭

translation.en: Overcooked the spaghetti. Got into a food fight.
translation.zh:
把义大利面煮糊
打义大利面仗

translation.en: Proofread Jenny's column. Read Sebastian's latest opus.
translation.zh: 帮珍妮校对 看史柏汀的大作

translation.en: Went running with Marley to burn off frustration.
Didn't see him chew the leash. Chased him 15 blocks.
translation.zh: 没发现它咬狗链 追到没气

translation.en: Had to call Jenny for a ride.
Wrote a column about gas prices. Wrote about water prices.
translation.zh: 以汽油价 水价作题材

translation.en: Found one tiny orange on our tree. Jenny very pleased with herself.
translation.zh: 种出小橘子 珍妮很欣慰

translation.en: Found my first gray hair. Found Jenny's first. Bought Jenny flowers.
translation.zh: 发现我们首条白发 买花哄她

translation.en: Rescued our new mailman from Marley. Rescued the UPS guy from Marley.
translation.zh: 救新邮差一命 救速递员一命

translation.en: Invited my parents.
Took them out to dinner at a cool place. Got in a fight with Dad over the check.
translation.zh: 请他们吃饭 跟老爸为买单吵架

translation.en: Got in a fight about money. Got in a fight with Jenny about fighting.
translation.zh: 为钱吵架 因此与珍妮吵架

translation.en: Drove my parents. Listened to them complain about not having grandchildren.
translation.zh: 送父母去机场 他们投诉没孙子

translation.en: Tracked a hurricane heading for Florida.
Hid in the bathroom during the hurricane. Sat in the dark for three days.
translation.zh: 躲进浴室 漆黑中呆坐三日

translation.en: Wrote a column about looters. Wrote about volunteers.
Wrote about air conditioning. Watched Marley dig for treasure.
translation.zh: 写冷气的伟大 看马利挖宝藏

translation.en: Spent Christmas with Jen's sister and family in Orlando.
Left Marley at their house to go to Disney World.
translation.zh: 丢下马利去迪士尼乐园玩

translation.en: Had to buy them new baby furniture.
Saw Jen light up around the girls. Got a flat driving home.
translation.zh: 珍妮很喜欢孩子 爆胎

translation.en: Wrote a column about state troopers. Wrote about tollbooths.
translation.zh: 以骑警和收费亭作题材

translation.en: Went to dinner to celebrate Jenny's raise. Tied Marley to the table.
translation.zh: 庆祝珍妮加薪 绑牢马利

translation.en: Marley, come here.
Chased Marley and the table.
Caught the table. Wrote about Marley pulling the table.
translation.zh: 只追到桌子 再写马利

translation.en: Tried to write a column about anything but Marley, nada.
translation.zh: 想写其它题材 想不到

translation.en: Picked oranges from our tree. Made orange juice.
Drove down to Miami for Bark in the Park night at the Marlins game.
translation.zh: 去迈阿密看“与狗同乐棒球赛”

translation.en: Brought Marley, who turned out to be a fan.
Tried to stop him chasing a ball in the stands.
Tried to stop him chasing a ball on the field. Wrote about the ball game.
translation.zh: 阻止它在场内追球 以此作题材

translation.en: Took crap from Sebastian about it. Met his new girlfriend.
translation.zh: 被史柏汀笑死 见了他的新女友

translation.en: Can't remember her name. Went snorkeling. Cut my leg on coral.
translation.zh: 一起浮潜 被珊瑚割伤

translation.en: Went to the emergency room. Wrote a column about hospitals.
translation.zh: 去急诊室 以医院为题

translation.en: Went to an Easter-egg hunt at Jenny's boss's in Boca.
translation.zh: 去豪宅区宝卡 拜访珍妮的老板

translation.en: Drank mimosas. Met a doctor who does three liposuctions a day.
translation.zh:
喝酒
认识了一天做三个抽脂手术的医生

translation.en: Wrote a column about nannies in Boca. Wrote a column about women of Boca.
translation.zh: 写宝卡区的褓姆 贵妇

translation.en: Wrote a column about writing columns.
translation.zh: （记者的笔记本） 在专栏讨论专栏

translation.en: Came home to find Jenny dancing with Marley.
Tried to think of reasons not to have a baby now...
translation.zh: 尝试想不生孩子的理由

translation.en: ...nada.
Why don't you just let him off the leash?
Because although I love him, I don't trust him.
translation.zh: 我爱它 但信不过它

translation.en: It's been two years. He's never had an accident.
Because I never let him off leash.
We're not gonna be the guys who get Dog Beach shut down, are we, Marley?
translation.zh: 我们不会做令海滩关闭的罪人

translation.en: Nope.
Okay, so, what's next?
-Ice cream? -No, I mean on your list.
translation.zh:
-吃冰？
-不是 我是说你的目标

translation.en: -My list? -Jen, the list.
Your play list you had when we got married that had the game plan.
-It was basically my marching orders. -My plan?
Your plan. I wanna know what's next. Scare me.
-You really wanna know? -Hit me.
Well, it's a tossup between a new roof...
Very practical.
--and a baby.
I could live with a few leaks.
-Really? -Yeah, a couple.
translation.zh:
真的？
-对 几个都没关系

translation.en: But you know, a couple leaks turn into maybe one big leak.
translation.zh: 由它穿洞也许会引发大事情

translation.en: And then that big leak becomes a very big responsibility.
translation.zh: 大件事又会演变成大责任

translation.en: That's true.
We may wanna think about fixing a lot of things before we start--
translation.zh: 发生前 也许有很多事得先安排好

translation.en: Well, we already fixed Marley.
If we fix too many more things, I think this conversation becomes moot.
translation.zh: 如顾虑太多 再讲也没意义

translation.en: John, are you serious?
Yeah. I think so.
You realize we're not talking about an actual roof?
Yes, I got that. About halfway through, I picked it up.
translation.zh: 我知道 你讲到一半我就懂了

translation.en: Good metaphor, though.
You're not just saying this because it'll lead to funny columns?
Well, I mean, honey, come on. I mean, if I get some funny columns...
translation.zh: 老婆 若真的会有有趣题材

translation.en: ...that's collateral damage I think we can live with.
I mean, I'm ready. I mean, if you are.
translation.zh: 若你已经准备好 我也准备好

translation.en: Instead of trying to have a baby...
...why don't we just stop trying not to have one?
Okay, if I'm following you correctly, and I think I am...
...this is the part where we head back, we take it off, and we get it on.
translation.zh: 你是说不如回家 脱光 然后开工

translation.en: Yes, but you'll-- It'll have a little more romance than that.
Yeah, we'll get some candles, some Sade. Of course.
translation.zh: 好 点些蜡烛 播点音乐

translation.en: Sade.
-Honey? -Yeah.
Did you have kibble today?
Marley, come on. Marley, go.
He's a dog. He won't know what he's looking at.
Trust me, he knows, and he resents the hell out of me.
-Go on, Marley. You have to go. -Oh, baby, please focus.
Okay, you're right.
Good. Good. It's even better than the last one.
-Thank you. -You're very good, Gorgan.
I like that piece you did in Boca on the woman. What did you call her?
translation.zh: 我喜欢宝卡女人那篇 你叫她什么？

translation.en: -Bocahontas. -Bocahontas.
Is that true? She had her boobs done four times?
-That's what she said. -Hysterical.
And is that true about you and your wife trying to have a kid?
Well, you know, we're not really trying, because we don't wanna--
-How does that work? -What do you mean?
-Well, I mean, are you having sex? -Yeah.
-Did you pull the goalie? -Yeah.
Then you're trying. Congratulations. Good work.
translation.zh: 就是想啦 恭喜！做得好

translation.en: -You're not "trying" trying. -Oh, yeah.
Of course, you'd know that if you ever read my column.
All due respect, but does anybody ever read your column?
translation.zh: 不好意思 真的有人看？

translation.en: Come on, I bring Marley here to help you run your game on these poor girls... ...and this is the thanks we get.
translation.zh:
我带马利出来帮你泡妹妹
你竟如此报答我

translation.en: -How long you been at it? -A few months.
-What changed your mind? -Well, here's the thing.
I'm actually married to someone, and I care about what she wants.
translation.zh: 我娶了她 也关心她想要什么

translation.en: -Well, is it what you want? -Yeah.
-I guess that answers my other question. -Yeah?
translation.zh:
-我另一问题也有答案了
-什么？

translation.en: I'm about to do a piece on the growth of the domestic drug trade for The Times.
translation.zh: 我会帮时报写国内毒品交易的报导

translation.en: You're freelancing for The New York Times?
Yeah, yeah, but it's a big story, too big for one guy...
translation.zh: 对 但题材太大 很难独力完成

translation.en: ...and I was hoping you'd write it with me.
Are you kidding me?
-It would be a chance to work together. -Yeah, I would love that.
translation.zh:
-我们有机会合作
-一定很开心

translation.en: Of course, it will be a lot of work, a lot of travel.
translation.zh: 工作很繁重 要不断出差

translation.en: I would hope so.
Maybe not the best job for somebody with a kid on the way.
translation.zh: 或不太适合快为人父的人

translation.en: Well, that's not necessarily happening right this very second.
translation.zh: 其实也没必要现在就生

translation.en: Let me talk it ov--
There she is.
-Honey, how are you? -Hi.
I'm just calling to let you know that there is a naked woman in your bed.
translation.zh: 打来通知你 有裸女在床上等你

translation.en: Why don't the two of you get started and I'll be there as soon as I can?
translation.zh: 你们先开始 我尽快到

translation.en: That's very funny. But seriously, can you come home now?
translation.zh: 很幽默 讲真的 能不能马上回来？

translation.en: Hey. We're home.
Hi.
You know the baby thing?
I've been thinking maybe we should take a break.
You know?
I mean, obviously it's not working...
translation.zh: 努力未有回报 可能是

translation.en: ...and maybe it's nature's way of saying now's not the right timing.
translation.zh: 大自然在暗示我们还不是时候

translation.en: I mean, maybe it's a sign that we're not quite ready for this, that--
-I mean, have we really thought this--? -John.
I'm pregnant.
Great.
-Great. Really? -Yeah.
-Yes. -You were just saying--?
No, don't worry, that was like-- It sounds so awkward now.
translation.zh: 没有 只是现在讲起来很怪

translation.en: Like I just had this, like, very, you know, idiotic soliloquy that doesn't apply...
translation.zh: 刚才只是自言自语 当没听到好了

translation.en: ...and I'm really excited.
-Do you wanna start over? -I would love to.
-That would be great. Can we? Good. -By all means.
-I'm pregnant. -What? No! Yes!
-Don't make the same mistake I did. -What?
translation.zh:
-听着 别重蹈我覆辙
-什么意思？

translation.en: There's gonna come a time very soon where her ankles are gonna swell up.
No, no, I'm ready for that.
She's gonna have blotches all over her face.
-Yeah. -She'll be 40 pounds overweight.
-She'll be throwing up all the time. -I'm not ready for that.
translation.zh:
-日呕夜呕
-那个我毫无心理准备

translation.en: She's gonna look at you and say, "You bastard. You did this to me."
translation.zh:
她会对你说：
“混蛋 都是你害的！”

translation.en: What happened to the glow, the, you know, the--?
There's no glow.
Get her a gift. That will dissipate some of the anger.
translation.zh: 送她礼物 可稍为平息怨愤

translation.en: Some earrings, a bracelet.
That's thoughtful. That's a good idea. In fact, maybe I'll get on it right now.
There's a jewelry store on the corner. Mention my name.
translation.zh:
-街口有间珠宝店 说是我介绍的
-好

translation.en: Oh, John.
It's just beautiful.
It's just beautiful.
-Honey, thank you. -You're welcome.
I was just walking by just thinking of you...
...and I saw that in the window and I go, "I'm getting this."
-That's so sweet. -Yeah, well....
-Do you like it? -I love it.
Put it on. Or let me put it on. I think it's better luck.
translation.zh: 戴上 我帮你 这样是好兆头

translation.en: -Where'd it go? I just had it. -You just set it down. Did you drop it?
translation.zh:
-在哪？刚才还在
-你放下了 掉了？

translation.en: -No, I put it right here. -Well, it didn't just disappear.
translation.zh:
-不 我放在这
-不会无故消失

translation.en: Oh, God.
-Marley. No, Marley, spit it out. -No, go to the kitchen, go to the kitchen.
translation.zh:
-马利 吐出来
-不 去厨房

translation.en: -That's okay. Come on, just-- -No, it's not okay. It's not okay.
I told you not to leave anything edible where he can get it.
translation.zh: 早说过别把吃的放在它附近！

translation.en: I know, but you wouldn't exactly say this is edible.
John, you know what I mean.
You said you'd get up early and walk him. He chews things when he gets restless.
translation.zh: 又说会早起放狗 它一无聊便乱咬

translation.en: -I am gonna walk him. I just woke up. -Know what? Forget it.
translation.zh:
我才刚起床 -算了！我自己做！
-你不需…

translation.en: -I'm gonna do it myself. -You don't have to--
Yes, I'm doing it myself.
You don't get it. She's gonna kill you.
You've got to take it easy.
We're both hanging by a thread.
-So who gets the dog if you guys split up? -We're not splitting up.
translation.zh:
-若离婚 狗归谁？
-不会离婚

translation.en: -Out of the realm of possibility? -Completely.
There's nothing she can do... ...no tantrum too big, no depression too deep...
translation.zh:
难道她不会太大脾气
太抑郁

translation.en: ...no failure to perform wifely duties, that would push you over?
translation.zh: 不想亲热 而令你想离婚？

translation.en: Why do you jump right to splitting up? Come on, buddy. Mend it, don't end it.
translation.zh: 为何不断提离婚？这不是解决方法

translation.en: -So life is better with Jenny than without? -Yes, what--?
Are you wearing a wire? Jen, are you--? She's listening to this.
translation.zh: 你有窃听器？珍妮 你…她在听！

translation.en: Jenny, yes, we had a fight, but I still love you.
translation.zh: 珍妮 虽然吵架 我仍爱你

translation.en: I mean, come on, buddy. I had a fight with my wife. Let me just sulk.
translation.zh: 我刚与老婆吵架 让我发下牢骚

translation.en: I just wanna know if you're really happy.
Oh, wait, there she is.
-Where? Who? -Give me the kid.
No, no, no, I can't be a party to this. That's shameless.
translation.zh: 不行 我不同流合污 好无耻

translation.en: This is gonna be even better than the puppy.
No, not my son.
Marley, no. Please, please, Marley, no. Please.
Please.
Marley! Marley, what are you--?
Marley, God, look at this.
Stop it. Why do you do this? Why do you ruin everything? Go on.
Patrick! Are you okay? I'm sorry.
John, get that dog out of here. I want that dog out of here right now.
-I'll take him for a walk. -No, take him to that farm.
All right, buddy, we're going to the farm again.
translation.zh: 好吧 又被赶去农场了

translation.en: Hey, I'm serious. I'm not kidding.
-I can't take this anymore. -What did he do?
Everything. What hasn't he done? He's just a horrible, horrible animal.
translation.zh: 坏事做尽 它做过什么好事？坏狗

translation.en: Well, that's a little unfair.
No, what's unfair is that Conor hasn't slept in two weeks...
translation.zh: 康纳被吠声吵得两星期没法睡

translation.en: ...because of that dog's barking...
...that Patrick gets knocked down twice a day...
...that I can't even think straight.
-And God forbid there's a hint of thunder. -Just calm down for a second.
translation.zh:
-还要祈盼别再打雷！
-你冷静点

translation.en: I know it's been a rough couple of months with the new baby.
translation.zh: 家有初生儿 这数月必会很难捱

translation.en: I understand that.
But I was talking with Arnie, and postpartum depression--
Don't you dare.
I am not depressed. I am exhausted.
translation.zh: 我没抑郁 只是精疲力尽

translation.en: I am not angry because of some condition.
I can't even go out for an hour without the kids...
...because every babysitter is terrified of Marley.
I know, but you said you didn't wanna work anymore.
translation.zh: 当初是你说不想再工作

translation.en: -We can get help, but you said-- -I don't need any help!
-Just get rid of the dog. -That's not gonna happen, obviously.
translation.zh:
-赶它走就好！
-当然不行 不可以

translation.en: -Please keep your voice down. -Me keep my voice down?
Just get rid of the dog. Everybody gets rid of their dogs.
-It's just a dog. -I'm just a husband.
-Gonna get rid of me? -I've thought about it.
-Oh, well, that makes two of us. -What do you have to complain about?
What do I--? Oh, because you're such a joy to be around?
Oh, you're such a jerk.
Nice to walk in and feel like you're joining a chain gang.
translation.zh: 看你忙得像奴隶真高兴啊

translation.en: Just a jerk.
Stop it.
It's your fault.
You gotta be kidding me.
Nope. It's just for a couple days till things cool down at home.
translation.zh: 只是几日 暂避风头

translation.en: A couple days will be all right.
You guys know each other, so you should be okay.
translation.zh: 你们相识 一定相处愉快

translation.en: You want a beer?
I'm all right.
Are you moving?
-Yeah. -Where?
New York.
The Gray Lady came a-courting.
The Times offered you a permanent job?
Gave Arnie my notice last week.
-You didn't even say anything. -I know. I'm sorry, I just....
translation.zh:
-你没告诉我
-我知道 对不起

translation.en: It all happened so fast, I'm not even used to the idea yet.
translation.zh: 事出突然 我也没来得及能消化

translation.en: That's great. The New York Times.
It's what we always dreamed of.
Well, congratulations. I mean, you deserve it.
-Thanks for looking after Marley. -Yeah.
He's eating your briefcase right now.
-Shit. -Marley. Marley, no.
-Two days, John, I'm serious. -Sorry.
-Sorry, I didn't mean to wake you. -I wasn't sleeping.
Where's Marley?
Sebastian's gonna watch him for a few days.
I'd love to see that.
Just until I can find a more permanent home.
translation.zh: 直至帮它找到好人家为止

translation.en: This is his permanent home, John. Marley's not going anywhere.
translation.zh:
这里就是它的家 约翰
马利不用走

translation.en: Honey, I'm sorry. I just got overwhelmed.
translation.zh: 对不起 是我太激动

translation.en: No one tells you how hard this is all gonna be.
Which part?
What? All of it.
Marriage, being a parent.
It's the hardest job in the world, and nobody prepares you for that.
translation.zh: 全是艰难任务 但却无人指点

translation.en: Nobody tells you how much you have to give up.
translation.zh: 无人说过要放弃这么多

translation.en: I feel like they do tell you, but, I don't know, you don't listen...
translation.zh: 有人说过 只是听不入耳

translation.en: ...or you think, "They're just miserable."
I've given up so much of what made me who I am.
translation.zh: 我为这个家放弃了自己

translation.en: But I can't say that, because I'm a very bad person if I say that.
translation.zh:
却不能说出口
否则我便是个差劲的人

translation.en: But I feel that, I really do. I feel it sometimes.
translation.zh: 但我有这想法 不时会这样想

translation.en: I just....
-I just want you to know that. -I do know that.
translation.zh: 我只是想你知道 我当然知道

translation.en: -And you can say it. I say it. -But I did make a choice.
translation.zh:
-你说出口也没有错
-但这是我的选择

translation.en: I made a choice, and even if it's harder than I thought...
translation.zh: 我既已选择 即使比想像中难…

translation.en: ...I don't regret it.
-Are you sure? -I'm very sure.
Because it kind of has a "there's no place like home" feeling to it.
translation.zh: 是因为“在家千日好”的幻想？

translation.en: I think these things are gonna happen, and we're gonna get through them.
translation.zh: 不 困难一定有 我们定能应付

translation.en: -And we'll just do it together. -Together.
Getting rid of Marley is not gonna fix anything.
translation.zh: 赶走马利根本于事无补

translation.en: No.
And getting rid of you isn't gonna fix anything either.
translation.zh: 赶你走 也一样于事无补

translation.en: -Can I ask you a favor? -Yes.
No more kids for a while?
Absolutely. Deal.
Hi, guys.
All right, say hello to Colleen.
-Daddy says her name is Whoops. -Oh, no, I....
-Patrick said that. -What?
-I don't know. -Why did you say that?
I was just kidding around. It was kind of a secret, guys.
translation.zh: 我只是说笑 这应该是秘密

translation.en: Over here.
-Wait, wait. Over here. -Oh, yeah!
The old pro brings it back.
He looks for a little separation, gets an assist from Colleen.
translation.zh: 找出破绽 传球给可琳

translation.en: -Nice shot, Dad. -Come on, "Nice shot"? Come on, Conor.
translation.zh:
射得好！ -“射得好？”
-康纳 你说

translation.en: -Extraordinary. -Yeah. Again.
No, wait, let me get that. I'll be back.
-All right. -My knees are shot.
Hello?
Yes, it is.
Yeah, yeah.
Hi, how are you? Thanks for getting back to me.
-Darn. -Hey, who was that on the phone?
The Philadelphia Inquirer.
I sent the editor some clips a while back, and he wants to meet.
translation.zh: 早前寄了稿件给编辑 现约我面试

translation.en: What's a while back?
He was down here on vacation like a month ago...
...and he read my stuff, and we kind of had lunch.
translation.zh: 看过我专栏 找我吃饭

translation.en: How do you kind of have lunch?
Well, I didn't think anything was gonna come of it.
-Okay, but...? -They offered me a job.
I mean, I have, you know, an interview.
As, like, a columnist or...?
-As a reporter. -As a reporter?
Well, what did you say?
I said, "Thank you very much, but I'm happy here."
translation.zh: “多谢 但我在此生活愉快”

translation.en: "Never have I heard someone piss and moan as much as John Grogan. If he doesn't like it here, he should move."
translation.zh:
“约翰葛罗根对这里诸多不满
何不干脆搬走”

translation.en: Part of my job is to get a response.
I'm glad to see a little blood flowing from people.
No, there's a recurring theme here.
The theme is that we got a lot of cranks in Broward County.
That's what I'm up against.
What I'm trying to say, with all due respect, is that you are one of them.
translation.zh: 恕我直言 你也是其中之一

translation.en: Well, I'm a commentator.
Everyone wants me to act like everything's great when there are issues.
translation.zh: 社会充满问题 读者却只想我写笑料

translation.en: There's overcrowding, there's crime, there's racial tensions.
translation.zh: 人口过多 罪案 种族仇恨

translation.en: Every time you turn around, there's a new sky rise even uglier than the--
translation.zh: 每次转身便多一栋更丑的高楼

translation.en: That goes on all over the world. It's not Florida, it's you. What's wrong?
translation.zh: 这些问题不只这里独有 是你有问题

translation.en: Nothing's wrong. Everyone wants to think:
"Oh, he's turning 40. He's become a curmudgeon."
translation.zh: 以为我人到四十变得难服侍

translation.en: That's not it. Maybe....
I don't know. I don't know, maybe I'm sick of my column.
translation.zh: 我不知道 或已厌倦写专栏

translation.en: I don't find the things that I'm saying that interesting.
translation.zh: 我不觉得我的专栏好笑

translation.en: John, John, you're the comic voice of South Florida.
translation.zh: 约翰 你是南佛州的笑匠

translation.en: You're a national treasure, for God's sakes.
Maybe a regional treasure.
-Well, a municipal treasure for sure. -Thank you.
Listen, take a vacation. Go away for a couple weeks.
-Take a month off. -And go where?
-I don't know. Take-- -I live in a vacation spot.
Then go someplace where it's painful and sad.
translation.zh: 那去个充满痛苦的地方

translation.en: Forty is gonna be tough, buddy. I'm not gonna lie to you.
translation.zh: 四十岁很难捱 我不是说笑

translation.en: But we knew that.
We knew this was when Father Time was gonna make his move...
translation.zh: 早知时间之神不会放过我们

translation.en: ...try to take us down a dark alley and just beat the hell out of us.
translation.zh: 一定会把我们折磨一番

translation.en: You got a little more white around the temples...
...but it makes you look more distinguished, I think.
translation.zh: 但令你看来更出类拔萃

translation.en: We both lost a step.
Well, how's it feel to have your best years behind you?
translation.zh: 你呢？青春不再 有何感觉？

translation.en: You do everything you wanted to?
No, me neither.
All right. You hot? You wanna cool off? Let's do it.
translation.zh: 你热吗？想凉快一下？好吧

translation.en: You know what?
Not today.
You've been on a leash a little too long.
Go, go.
You got a little bit of a second wind.
Go get it.
-Hey, get your dog! -What?
No, no. Please, God, no.
No, no, no!
Come here, come here. It's okay.
Dude, that was not cool.
Come on, girl, let's go!
Great.
Let's go. Let's go.
Man, you are the world's worst dog. You know that, right?
translation.zh:
老兄
你是世上最烦的狗

translation.en: You were top five going into the day...
...and with this little stunt, you moved into number one.
translation.zh: 今日一事 你升上第一名

translation.en: And I take my hat off to you.
Surprise!
Dad, can I blow out--?
-Happy birthday. -Yes, you can help me.
But hold on, hold on. On three.
-One, two, three. -One, two, three.
translation.zh:
-一 二 三
-一 二 三

translation.en: But don't beg, Marley.
That's not good. Because we don't have to.
Tell me the truth. Were you surprised?
Completely, yes. Thank you.
-Really? -I was. You guys got me.
We got you.
Are you ready for your birthday present?
There's more? I don't need any other present.
-Happy birthday. -What was that?
That was my blessing to take that job in Philadelphia.
translation.zh: 我的祝福 祝你夺得费城的工作

translation.en: That was months ago. I'm not thinking about that.
translation.zh: 事隔多月 我已没再想

translation.en: Well, then any other job. We'll follow you wherever you wanna go.
translation.zh: 找其它工作 我们会跟随你

translation.en: I understand, but I'm not gonna do that. I'm not gonna uproot us.
translation.zh: 我知道 但我不想搬家

translation.en: We've got our friends, the kids enjoy school...
translation.zh: 这里有朋友 孩子 有同学

translation.en: ...and I've got my poker game.
-I couldn't possibly. -First of all, it's just an interview.
You don't have the job yet.
And second of all, honey, you don't have any friends.
That's right. I was wondering, who were all those strangers tonight?
translation.zh: 对呢 今晚那些人是谁

translation.en: I hired them.
What I'm trying to say is that our life is here, and I'm okay with that.
translation.zh: 这里是我们的家 我很满足

translation.en: Our life is wherever we are.
translation.zh: 只要一起 四海亦为家

translation.en: -That's it. And you're not happy here. -That's not true.
You're not happy doing that column. You're restless. I can feel it.
translation.zh: 你不想写专栏 我知道你很不安

translation.en: I'm not.
I feel it every day that you read Sebastian's articles.
translation.zh: 看见你每天看史柏汀的报导

translation.en: I feel it every time you sit an extra five minutes in your car...
translation.zh: 每天在车上多坐五分钟

translation.en: ...before you come in.
-I don't do that. -You do.
-I'm checking things in the car, I'm not-- -I just think it's time for a change.
translation.zh:
-我在检查汽车
-是时候改变了

translation.en: I'm 40, Jen.
Maybe at 39, but I'm too-- I don't know.
It feels a little late to be making big changes.
translation.zh:
-现在做重大改变已太迟
-不会

translation.en: No, no, no.
What are you doing?
We're not old, John.
We can still surprise ourselves.
See, most girls would do a swan dive...
...but you know that a cannonball is so much sexier.
So are you ready for your other birthday present or what?
translation.zh: 准备好收另一份礼物吗？

translation.en: Yes.
This is like an embarrassment of riches, this birthday.
They just keep coming. It's like Hanukkah.
translation.zh: 礼物不断 像过节一样

translation.en: See? We're not old.
Grogan.
-Just wanna wish you good luck up there. -Thanks. Yeah.
It'll be good. I'm gonna miss everybody.
-I'm gonna miss your laugh. -Yeah.
There's a good chance that every piece of advice I gave you was a lot of crap.
translation.zh: 我以前给你的建议 可能都是废话

translation.en: Oh, no, no. I appreciate it just the same.
translation.zh: 不 不是 就算是 都很感激

translation.en: Well, at this point, a mushy guy would tell you he was proud of you...
translation.zh: 若是感性的家伙会说以你为荣

translation.en: ...give you a hug, and send you on your way.
Well, I'm glad you're not that guy, sir.
All right.
Okay. Thanks.
Grogan, just for the record, you surprised the hell out of me.
translation.zh:
葛罗根 我必需说
你让我另眼相看

translation.en: That's my specialty.
-Are we here yet? -No.
-Now? -We got a couple hours to go.
-Now? -Soak it up.
-Now? -We must be near it.
Are we getting hot or cold?
-Why are we turning in here? -We're living here.
I want a moment of silence just to take this in, okay?
translation.zh: 让我们先静静欣赏片刻

translation.en: Before the pandemonium. Look at this.
-Here we go. -Come on, we're here.
Marley. Marley, no.
Marley, Marley, Marley, no, no. Marley, no.
And we're home.
Hey, Andy Rooney. If you're knocking off, I'll walk with you to the train.
translation.zh: 幽默作家 我等你写完一起走

translation.en: Okay, I'm ready. Put an exclamation point here.
translation.zh: 快了 只差个惊叹号

translation.en: Mark Twain said not to use exclamation points... ...because it's like laughing at your own joke.
translation.zh:
马克吐温说用惊叹号
像在自说自笑

translation.en: Sometimes you gotta laugh at your own joke because it's funny.
translation.zh: 但实在太有趣 怎能忍着不笑

translation.en: -It's here, it's here, it's here! -Mom, get up, get up, get up.
-Where? Where? Where? -Over here.
Come on, come on, come on. It's here, it's here.
Come on, Dad. Look, Daddy. Come on, come on, come on.
Whoa, Daddy.
Okay, look at me. Guys, guys, guys.
Remember, angels can fly, so you gotta get the wings up high.
translation.zh: 天使会飞 翼要拍高点

translation.en: Yeah. Now, that one's coming. Now you can really see it.
translation.zh: 快完成了 像真的天使一样

translation.en: Guys, lunch is ready.
-Okay. Heading in. -Take that.
-I'll get you. -Let's go. Marley!
-Come on, guys. -Marley, come on. Marley.
No, no, you know what, honey? Let him be. He's happy.
Thank you.
What are you doing in here?
You're going for the bunk bed tonight?
Pretty good day. I mean, the snow? Come on.
translation.zh:
很美的一天
我是说下雪

translation.en: All right. Sleep tight.
-Too much color? -Yeah.
Don't get me wrong, it's a good piece. But you're reporting now, John.
translation.zh: 别误会 你写得好 但这是报导

translation.en: I want you to tell the story, I don't want you to be in the story.
translation.zh: 要客观 别用自己角度

translation.en: I'm pretty sure I don't mention myself in there.
The point is, I still feel you in there.
And all I'm saying is less you and more facts.
translation.zh: 减少个人观点 尽量客观

translation.en: Got it.
-Door's always open. -Thanks.
He's coming, he's coming.
Here comes the old pro. He shows up for the fourth quarter.
translation.zh: 老手来了！加入战团助阵

translation.en: Yeah. Oh, yes. He catches it.
Then he fends off one guy.
translation.zh: 挡开一个 冲出重围！

translation.en: He's running through there. He's shaking tackles left and right.
They can't get him, because he's got too much--
translation.zh: 拦不住他 因为他胆色过人！

translation.en: And Grogan goes down. Down goes Grogan.
-You're home early. -That's right.
I had to come home and teach these kids how to play football the right way.
translation.zh: 早点回来教孩子玩美式足球

translation.en: Okay.
-Guys, seriously, dinner's in an hour. -Okay.
And I want you to finish your homework...
...and take off those shoes before you come in.
Yeah, take off your shoes.
Ground and pound, ground and pound, ground and pound.
My God.
I come home and it's like I got mugged.
Okay.
Come on.
What's wrong with him, Dad?
Nothing's wrong. He's just tired. Right, Dad?
translation.zh:
-没事的 只是太累
-是吗 爸爸？

translation.en: Yeah. I think the football took it out of him.
Let's go.
I don't know, I just don't understand.
A year ago, you couldn't wait to be done with your column.
translation.zh: 你去年恨不得停写专栏

translation.en: I know, but now I got this guy...
...going through every sentence with a fine-toothed comb...
...and I gotta admit, I miss the freedom, where I could just--
What?
It's just-- It's exhausting sometimes, John.
translation.zh: 我有时真的听厌了 约翰

translation.en: You always wanting something that you don't have.
translation.zh: 你总是羡慕自己没有的东西

translation.en: Are you happy?
-I mean, none of this was part of the plan. -No.
No, it wasn't part of the plan.
But it's so much better.
You know? I'm just sort of done making plans.
Marley. Oh, gross.
Seems like somebody needs to go out.
All right. Marley.
Come on. Come on, boy.
Oh, come on.
Now it's really coming down.
Marley?
Marley!
Where did he go? Marley!
What's going on?
I don't know, he's just-- He's not coming back.
-Marley! -Well, he couldn't have gone far.
-Marley! -I'll come with you. Hold on.
Marley! I don't know where he could've gone.
Maybe he went next door again in the barn.
-Well, we can check in the woodshed. -Okay.
Marley!
Marley?
Marley.
Where the...?
-Do you see anything? -No, nothing.
-I gotta go talk to them. -Okay.
Oh, wow, it's pouring out there.
Did you find him?
You know what? He's out exploring.
You know how he loves the woods.
Bobby says dogs, when they're gonna die...
translation.zh: 同学说狗知道自己快要死时

translation.en: ...they go away to do it.
That's what his beagle did.
Well, you know what, that's true for beagles...
...but not Labs like Marley.
He's just out causing trouble. Don't worry.
translation.zh: 它只是出去闯祸 别担心

translation.en: Okay, now, you finished with your homework?
-Yep. -Nope.
Nope? Well, let's make that a "yep." Come on, now.
translation.zh: 没？那你快去做 快去

translation.en: Marley! Marley!
Marley!
Marley.
Marley. Marley, are you okay?
Just stay there.
Why did his stomach twist? We don't exactly know why this happens.
translation.zh: 它为何患上胃捻转 我们也不清楚

translation.en: Most likely, he ate or drank something quickly...
...and his stomach just flipped.
I did manage to get a tube down there to relieve some of the gas.
-I think I untwisted it. -He seems okay.
translation.zh:
-现在应该无碍了
-它看似无恙

translation.en: For now he's good.
The problem is that once this happens, it almost always happens again.
translation.zh: 但一旦患上 通常会复发

translation.en: And if it does, I don't know what I'm gonna be able to do for him.
He's an older dog.
I honestly don't think he would survive the surgery.
Well, we have to make sure that it doesn't happen again.
Most likely, it is gonna happen again.
Well, you also talked about that maybe he ate too fast... ...or drank, you know, too quickly...
translation.zh: 你说也许是饮食太急所致

translation.en: ...and so maybe it doesn't have to happen again.
We'll monitor that.
I'm just saying you may wanna prepare yourself...
...that he may not make it through the night.
Maybe 10 percent of dogs survive this kind of a thing.
What is that number based on?
What is it based on?
Yeah, the reason why I ask is, I bet that number is based on regular dogs.
translation.zh:
这样问是因为
这数据应以正常狗作标准

translation.en: Regular dogs?
Yeah, and this guy here is not like other dogs.
translation.zh: 对 但它绝非正常狗

translation.en: I know people say that all the time... ...but to be honest, I'm not sure he really is a dog.
translation.zh:
主人总会这样说
但是它或许真的不是狗

translation.en: He once ate an answering machine, just polished it off.
He didn't chew it, he ate it and then digested it...
...and then had the phone for dessert.
Another time, my son had colic, and this guy sat up all night, didn't move.
translation.zh: 我儿子肠绞痛时 它整晚守着不动

translation.en: Just stayed right there for nine hours, just keeping an eye on Conor.
translation.zh: 守了九小时 帮忙看顾康纳

translation.en: So I think maybe that the, you know, the number applies to regular dogs...
translation.zh: 所以这数据或许只适用于正常狗

translation.en: ...but not to him.
Well, you've got a fighter here.
Let's hope for the best.
Oh, I know he's gonna be okay. I'll see you in the morning.
translation.zh: 它会没事的 明早见

translation.en: -Oh, hi. -Hey.
They're gonna keep him overnight, but he seemed better when I left.
translation.zh: 它要留院 但我走时它已好转

translation.en: And the vet really seemed on top of it.
-Are you okay? -Yeah, I'm good.
-What are you reading? -I'm reading your old columns.
Marley's in so many of them.
You still look at those?
Yeah, I do sometimes.
Even on the crappiest days...
...when the kids are driving me nuts, the laundry's not done...
translation.zh: 快被孩子逼疯 衣服又没洗

translation.en: ...and a hundred other things are wrong...
...I always know that I have this.
It's five minutes of you.
Sometimes they're sad... ...and sometimes they're really funny, silly or whatever...
translation.zh:
有些很悲伤 有些真的很有趣
有些还很笨

translation.en: ...but they're all you.
And for those five minutes...
...you make me feel better.
You should read them. They're pretty great.
translation.zh: 你应该看 真的不错

translation.en: Might even make a nice book.
-A book? -Something.
Hello?
All right.
Thank you.
He's coming home.
Is he there?
Of course he's there. He's always there.
translation.zh: 当然在 它一向都在

translation.en: How does he know when we're coming?
translation.zh: 它怎么知道我们正回来？

translation.en: I don't know. He just knows.
translation.zh: 不清楚 它就是知道

translation.en: Dogs know stuff like that.
-All dogs? -All good dogs.
-Look, there he is. There he is, Marley. -Yeah.
Hi, Marley.
-Marley. -How you doing, Marley?
-I missed you at school. -Hey, I'll race you to the house.
translation.zh: 很想你 看谁跑得快

translation.en: -Okay. -Go.
-Eagles? -Yeah, the Eagles are going all the way.
-I don't know. -I guarantee you.
-What are you, a Dolphins fan? -No.
-John Grogan. -Hey.
-I'll see you tomorrow. -All right.
I said to myself, "That sorry son of a bitch looks like John Grogan."
translation.zh: 我在想“这苦瓜脸像极了约翰”

translation.en: -What are you doing here? -A story.
DEA's showing off the new field office. I'm cov--
You know what? Doesn't matter. Man, it is good to see you.
translation.zh: 管它呢 再见你真好

translation.en: -It's good to see you. -Yeah.
-You living in the city somewhere? -I live just outside of town.
More space for the kids.
-Oh, what do you got, like five now? -Three. Here.
I'll show you a little snapshot of the Grogan brood.
-Wow, Jen's holding up. -Yeah, thanks. I think.
translation.zh:
-珍妮保养得不错
-我应该说谢谢

translation.en: I see you finally got a little girl, huh?
-Colleen. She arrived after you left. -What's with the ladybug getup?
translation.zh:
-可琳 你走后便出世
-她穿甲虫装？

translation.en: That was for her school play in preschool...
...and then we couldn't get her out of her costume for a month afterwards.
And the reason why Marley looks like he's biting her head...
...is because of the antennas on-- He went ballistic.
translation.zh: 其实是咬触须 它很爱玩

translation.en: -Things don't change. -That's right.
I wish I didn't have this interview.
That's okay, I gotta get home. I got-- Conor's got a soccer game.
translation.zh: 不要紧 我也赶着看儿子比赛

translation.en: All right, well, one of these days we've gotta catch up.
Yeah, let's do that. We'll catch up one of these days.
-Well, it was good to see you. -Come here. Good to see you.
-Give Jenny my best, okay? -All right. I will. Okay.
-Here. -Oh, yeah.
Here. That's a great picture, John.
You did okay.
Thanks. You did okay too.
-I'll see you. -I'll see you.
-I think you'll like the next one better. -Good.
Don't do it to yourself. We're in Philly. Let's get a cheese steak. Hi.
translation.zh: 在费城一定要吃起司牛排 你好！

translation.en: -Hi. -Sebastian.
-Hello. -Nice to meet you.
translation.zh: 我叫史柏汀 很高兴认识你

translation.en: Nice to meet you.
Hello?
Is anybody home?
Marley, hey. Marley, Marley, Marley.
Hey, hey. Marley. Marley.
Marley. You didn't hear me, did you?
translation.zh: 喂！马利！ 你听不见吗？

translation.en: I just caught you in a senior moment there, Marley.
translation.zh: 马利 你开始老人痴呆了

translation.en: All right, let's go for a walk. Come on, let's go.
Come on. Come on. You're almost to the top.
translation.zh: 来吧 努力 快爬到顶了

translation.en: You know what? Come here.
This is a good spot right here.
I know you're a strong boy, but you're gonna let me know, all right?
translation.zh: 我知道你很强壮 但若时间一到

translation.en: You know, when it's time.
I don't wanna make that decision on my own.
You let me know when you're ready, okay?
All right.
Marley?
There he is.
Marley.
Hi. Honey, what are you doing down here?
It's time to head upstairs. You don't sleep down here.
translation.zh: 上楼去 别在这里睡

translation.en: Come on.
Can you make it upstairs?
I think he's pretty comfortable down here.
-I'll get him a blanket. -You all right?
I'm gonna lay down here for a second.
Take a load off.
Yeah. It's actually nice down here.
translation.zh: 真的呢 这里挺舒服

translation.en: This might be better.
Well, it would be twice a week, 600 words.
And what's the subject?
You know, everyday stuff. The stuff we all go through, but funnier.
translation.zh: 平常的生活锁事 但较有趣

translation.en: I don't get it. I thought you came here to be a reporter.
I know, I did, but we both know that isn't me.
translation.zh: 没错 但大家心知肚明

translation.en: I'm a columnist, a good one, and I think--
Excuse me, John? Your wife's on the phone. It's important.
translation.zh: 打扰了 约翰？你太太打来 急事

translation.en: Okay, I'll be right there.
Think about it? Possible?
-Thanks. -You're welcome.
-Hello? -I can't get him to come back inside.
He's just laying out there in the cold, and he won't move.
translation.zh: 宁愿躺在寒风中 硬是不肯动

translation.en: -Hey. -Hi.
Patrick came home and we got him here.
Dr. Platt said that if he's comfortable, leave him for a while and see.
translation.zh: 兽医说若它没大碍 可以先按兵不动

translation.en: But he's just not getting better.
All right. I'm gonna take him in.
-Is he sick again? -Yeah, he is, honey.
He doesn't feel too good.
But I'm gonna take him to the doctor. They're gonna try to make him feel better.
translation.zh: 我带它看兽医 让它舒服点

translation.en: It's all right, Marley. You're gonna be okay.
You could take Lamby, but don't chew her other ear off.
translation.zh: 让小羊陪你 但别再咬掉它耳朵

translation.en: That's sweet, honey.
Here, I'll take it.
Bye.
Okay.
I've tried everything I did last time that worked...
translation.zh: 我已试尽所有方法 但这次没用

translation.en: ...but I'm not having any luck.
I'm not able to get the tube down there. The stomach is still twisted.
-There's still surgery, but-- -He's not strong enough.
-I like this one the best. -Which one?
Oh, the mangoes. Yeah.
-Hello? -Hey, it's me.
So it's his stomach again.
And they could do surgery, but....
I know.
Do you want me to come down there?
No, I think it's a good idea to stay with the kids and, you know, be with them.
translation.zh: 不 你留在家陪孩子 陪着他们

translation.en: And I'm just gonna....
I love you, John.
I love you.
Hi.
-I'm gonna give you some time. -Okay.
-I'll be right outside if you need me. -All right. Thanks.
Look what I got for you.
Remember this?
Look what Colleen sent you. You remember that?
translation.zh: 可琳给你的 记得吗？

translation.en: You remember chewing up that ear? No.
It's tough to remember all the things you've chewed up, isn't it?
translation.zh: 曾咬烂太多东西 记不起了吗？

translation.en: It all starts to kind of run together.
It's okay. You don't have to do anything.
translation.zh: 你累了 没关系的 你什么都不用做

translation.en: You don't have your usual energy.
You remember how we were always saying what a pain you are?
translation.zh: 记得我们曾说你有多讨厌？

translation.en: That you're the world's worst dog?
Don't believe it.
Don't believe it even for a minute...
...because you know we couldn't find a better dog.
You know, what made you such a great dog...
...is that you loved us every day, no matter what.
translation.zh: 因为不管怎样 你都爱我们

translation.en: That's an amazing thing.
You know how much we love you?
We love you so much.
We love you more than anything.
I don't know exactly where we go from here...
translation.zh: 我不知道我们死后会怎样

translation.en: ...but I want you to remember you're a great dog, Marley.
translation.zh: 但请你记住 你是很好的狗

translation.en: You're a great dog.
He won't feel this. He'll just slip away.
You ready?
-Yeah, we're ready. -Okay.
Okay. Get down.
-He's wrapped in his blanket. -Yeah, so he can stay warm.
translation.zh:
-它被毛毯包住
-对 可以保暖

translation.en: Do you guys wanna read what you wrote?
Mine's a picture of me and Marley, grasshoppers and ice cream.
translation.zh: 我画了自己 马利 蚱蜢和冰淇淋

translation.en: Mommy wrote what I said.
"Dear Marley, I will never forget you forever. Colleen."
translation.zh:
“马利 我永远不会忘记你
可琳上”

translation.en: And these are kisses.
-That's beautiful. -Thank you.
You wanna put it in? He'll like that. Set it down.
translation.zh: 想放进去吗？它会喜欢的 放进去

translation.en: Good. That's a great picture.
Conor, do you wanna...?
"Dear Marley, I loved you all my life.
I hope you like heaven and that there's lots to chew on.
translation.zh: 希望天堂有很多东西给你咬

translation.en: Your brother, Conor Richard Grogan."
That's a good letter.
Patrick, do you wanna say something?
He knows.
I'd like to give him something.
This necklace. It's been on quite a journey.
translation.zh:
这项链
陪我们经历很多

translation.en: Your dad gave it to me...
...to celebrate the beginning of our family.
translation.zh: 庆祝我们的家终于完整

translation.en: But, you know... ...our family had really already begun.
translation.zh:
但其实
自养它那天 这个家已完整

translation.en: Bye, Clearance Puppy.
A dog has no use for fancy cars...
...or big homes or designer clothes.
A waterlogged stick will do just fine.
translation.zh: 给它树枝就已经很满足

translation.en: A dog doesn't care if you're rich or poor...
...clever or dull, smart or dumb.
Give him your heart and he'll give you his.
translation.zh: 只要真心待它 它亦掏心相报

translation.en: How many people can you say that about?
How many people can make you feel rare and pure and special?
translation.zh: 有多少人能让你感到特别 纯洁？

translation.en: How many people can make you feel extraordinary?
translation.zh: 又有多少能让你感到棒极了？
